Package com.patiun.library.dao

Interface Dao<T extends Identifiable>

Type Parameters:
T - class, with instances of which the DAO operates. Has to be identifiable because all artifact tables contain the id column
All Known Subinterfaces:
Assembler<T>, AuthorDao, BookAssembler, BookDao, BookOrderAssembler, BookOrderDao, GenreDao, PublisherDao, SecondaryTableDao<T>, UserDao
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDao, AuthorDaoImpl, BookAssemblerImpl, BookDaoImpl, BookOrderAssemblerImpl, BookOrderDaoImpl, GenreDaoImpl, PublisherDaoImpl, UserDaoImpl
public interface Dao<T extends Identifiable>
This interface is concerned with performing CRUD operations on the database

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<T>
    getAll()
    Gets all objects from a database
    Optional<T>
    getById(Long id)
    Gets the object of id from database
    Long
    getIdOfNewOrExistingObject(T object)
    Gets id of object with the same state.
    void
    removeById(Long id)
    Deletes object of id from the database
    void
    save(T item)
    Adds an Object to the database or, if there already exists an object with the same id, updates the existing objects with new fields

  • Method Details

    • getById

      Optional<T> getById(Long id) throws DaoException
      Gets the object of id from database
      Parameters:
      id - id of object in the database
      Returns:
      Optional of object if there exists object of id in the database. Otherwise, returns Optional.empty()
      Throws:
      DaoException - if there were errors connecting to the database or while executing an SQL script

    • getAll

      List<T> getAll() throws DaoException
      Gets all objects from a database
      Returns:
      List object containing all found objects. May be empty
      Throws:
      DaoException - if there were errors connecting to the database or while executing an SQL script

    • save

      void save(T item) throws DaoException
      Adds an Object to the database or, if there already exists an object with the same id, updates the existing objects with new fields
      Parameters:
      item - object to be saved to the database
      Throws:
      DaoException - if there were errors connecting to the database or while executing an SQL script

    • removeById

      void removeById(Long id) throws DaoException
      Deletes object of id from the database
      Parameters:
      id - id of object in the database to be deleted
      Throws:
      DaoException - if there were errors connecting to the database or while executing an SQL script

    • getIdOfNewOrExistingObject

      Long getIdOfNewOrExistingObject(T object) throws DaoException
      Gets id of object with the same state. If there is no such object in the database, then this method creates one
      Parameters:
      object - object to search for equals of in the database or to save to the database and get id of
      Returns:
      Long object representing the id value of found/created object
      Throws:
      DaoException - if there were errors connecting to the database or while executing an SQL script
